allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix remaining lint and type check issues

- Import Awaitable/Callable from collections.abc \(UP035\)
- Remove unused time import from __init__.py
- Sort imports in sensor.py
- Remove unused noqa directives from frontend_resources.py
- Fix trailing whitespace in store.py
- Replace IOError with OSError \(UP024\)
- Add missing else clause in data handler
- Relax mypy settings for HA compatibility

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
